How Artificial Intelligence Is Used in Image Editing

AI is thetrending, phrase for all and business owners out there. It has special relevance in changing thewaywe capture moments in timeand work our way to process them.Yes, I am talking about how AI can and is already revolutionizing the image editing industry. Technology allows us to set up systems and processes that begin and end on their own.In business,technologyis usedin nearly each single department,starting from HR, automated marketing, inventory management. More computer software companies are presently switching over to machine learning. However, post-production of images is an exceptional story. It is usually a repetitive job, specially clipping of images, altering the background and basic retouching of mannequin or products. This makes the editing process much faster and help users focus on the creative output instead of the monotonous manual task'scommonplace in editing apps.Creativity can change the complete outcome of an image. To know more about the creativity of an image editing process, havea readthrough our blogTheImportance of Creativity in Image Editing.


So,How Does AI work?

AI takes in information given byhumans;this technologyuses deep learningto process informationbecomemore powerful overtime bylearningfrom its mistakes and gathering more information and workingmore efficiently.Basically, this innovation imitates or replaces human intelligence, and its more effective for essential tasks and ideas. There are as of now many different styles of AI image editing software accessible.It is most essential for photographers, image editors, orcreativedesigners who needtheir image tostand-out in ablink of eye.


So,whatare the features of a basic AI image editor,you wonder?

AI canmostlytell that yourwhite levels of your images are toowarm, or theimagecolors are not balanced, or if clarity controls of the image are needed.One tap of the screen,andthese new image processing softwareand applicationscan:

Remove backgrounds

E-commerce websitesnowadaysareopting for aclean and sleeklook.Almost all high-quality products are being highlighted witha white background,solidcolor, or transparent background.AI-powered imageeditingsoftwarecanremovebackgroundsina breeze.It helps you cut out the most difficult corners like hair and other structured area with precision and accuracy in just a fewclickson the undesired background.

Alter the landscapes

Changing the landscape of a bright and sunny day to a rainy one can be a very difficult process.Although, it takes time and process and more information to gather up for the perfect automated landscape weather changing. Once it has been processed into the system it can then turn images from snowy to sunny, day to night or even, fall to spring in an ease


Dont Stop the Contents!

Photos and write-ups are basic necessities to keep your website breathing and alive. While its important that you start your journey with them and always keep them on a check, its important to keep expanding you content collection with different varieties. Start with basic videos that explains your business to your customers. Then move to product demonstrations videos so people are more aware about its use in their lives. Other than that, periodically release infographics that informs your customers about ongoing trends, styles and other important current topics. Its also a good idea to hold regular podcasts as people will prefer listening than reading the contents you write. You can discuss the trends in your business, the blogs you publish, go for collaborations or bring in guests to keep retaining your customers attention.


Simply making these contents is not enough. You need to market them properly as well. Regularly post about them on your social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc.) as maintaining your visibility is a big part of branding. Keeping this in mind, only market your brand in those platforms where your customers are present. Always keep the out of sight, out of mind concept in head.

Dive in with E-mail Marketing

Youre doing great things in your business. Youre regularly uploading blogs, holding podcasts and introducing new collections that you know your customers are going to love. But are you customers being updated about these regular changes? You customers are already as busy as they can be and its silly to assume that theyll be regularly visiting you website to know about the new updates you introduce. Its your duty to let them know and the way to do that is through email marketing. Its best if you create a marketing calendar and plan your email marketings beforehand in accordance with the upcoming events, clearance or discount offers.

Serve your customers well

The tips and hacks weve discussed till now are for attracting customers to your website. But the way to making them into permanent ones is a whole another job. In a fast and fierce e-commerce world as today, theres always competitors with substitute products who are fighting to take away your customers. This is why, you must serve your customers well. Always be active and try to respond to their queries within 24 hours. Provide an active email address and keep a Chabot too for people who prefer chatting over a long and formal email. Be it review or any other social media mention, always reply when youre tagged in social media. Hold contests and lotteries often as these are the things that gets people excited and brings you closer to them. Being kind and polite can never serve you wrong.


The journey from being an online business to being a brand thats knowable and likable by everyone is not easy. Then again, whats fun about achieving things that are easy? The learnings and thrill youll enjoy while overcoming the challenges and becoming a known face from an unknown one will surely be worthwhile of all the troubles.
